SEND.LABEL: Label
SEND.LABELPLACEHOLDER: Lowani chizindikiro pa adilesiyi kuti muwonjezere ku bukhu la adiresi yanu
SEND.INPUTLOCKED: Kulowa kumatsekedwa. Mudzafunika kutsegula zotsatirazi kuti muthe kuzigwiritsa ntchito.
SEND.ALERTFEECHANGECONTENT: Malipiro enieniwo ndi apamwamba kusiyana ndi kuyembekezera. Chonde tsimikizani ndalama zatsopano:

STAKING.NOTENABLEDINSTR: Powopsya mudzafunika kuti staking ikule staking = 1 mu fayilo yanu ya metrix.conf.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINFO: Chikwama chako pakali pano chatsekedwa chifukwa cha staking.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINSTR: Mukhoza kuyamba kugwedeza mwa kutsegula chikwama chanu cha staking

MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: Palibe zotuluka za Masternode zomwe zapezeka. Kuyendetsa Masternode yakomweko kutumiza ndendende 2,5,25,50 kapena 100 miliyoni ku adilesi yanu ya Masternode ndikudikirira kutsimikizira 15.

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: Mukhoza kulemba mauthenga ndi maadiresi anu kuti muwonetse kuti ndinu enieni. Samalani kusayina chirichonse chosamvetsetseka, monga kuukira kwa phishing kungayese kukunyengererani kuti mulembe chizindikiro chanu kwa iwo. Lembani mawu okhazikika omwe mumavomereza.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Lowetsani adiresi yosayina, uthenga (onetsetsani kuti mumasintha mzere, mndandanda, ma tepi, ndi zina zotero) ndi siginecha pansipa kuti mutsimikize uthenga. Samalani kuti musamawerenge zambiri mu siginecha kusiyana ndi zomwe zili mu uthenga wolembedwawo, kuti musanyengedwe ndi kuukira pakati.

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Takulandirani ku Metrix Core RPC console. Thandizani chithandizo kuti muwone mwachidule malamulo omwe alipo.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: CHENJEZO: Anthu opanga mafilimu akhala akugwira ntchito, akuwuza ogwiritsa ntchito kufalitsa malamulo pano, kuba za chikwama chawo. Musagwiritse ntchito console iyi musamvetsetse ramification ya lamulo.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: Malamulo okonzanso sangathe kuthamanga pamene Metrix Core ikuyendetsedwa kunja
REPAIR.INFO: Mabatani omwe ali pamunsiwa ayambanso Metrix Core ndi njira zopangira maulamuliro kuti akonze chikwama, akonze zinthu ndi mafayilo owononga blockchain kapena zosowa / obsolete.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Kuyesera kubwezera mafungulo apachiyero kuchokera ku chikwama choyipa.dat.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Pezani blockchain kuti muwononge ndalama zogulitsa ngongole.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Pezani malonda kuchokera ku blockchain (sungani deta-data, mwachitsanzo mwini mwini wa akaunti)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Pezani malonda kuchokera ku blockchain (dontho la meta-data)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -kupititsa patsogolo: Kokweza thumba kuti mupangidwe posachedwa. (Zindikirani: izi sizomwe zikuchitika pa chikwama chomwecho!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Bwezerani chizindikiro cha blockchain kuchokera pa mafayilo a sasa a blk000 ??.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Kutsitsa mafayilo a Metrix blockchain kuchokera ku metrixcoin.com ndi bootstrap kukhazikitsa kwanu. Kutengera ndi kulumikizidwa kwa netiweki izi zimatha kutenga mphindi 10 kwa maola angapo
REPAIR.SYNCFROMSTARTINFO: Chotsani mafayilo anu a blockchain am'deralo ndikuyambiranso ku genesis block.
REPAIR.RESTARTCOREINFO: Kuyambitsanso Metrix Core ngati ikuyenda kale kapena kuyamba Metrix Core ngati siyikuyenda.
REPAIR.REINSTALLCOREINFO: Chotsani Metrix Core yakomweko ndi kuyikonzanso kuchokera ku seva za Metrix.

EXPLORER.TITLE: Dulani Explorer
EXPLORER.SEARCHNORESULTS: Simungathe kupeza chotsatira kapena malonda ofanana ndi kufufuza kwanu

NETWORK.PROXYTOR: Gwiritsani ntchito proxy SOCKS5 yosiyana kuti mufike kwa anzanu kudzera pazinthu zobisika za Tor
NETWORK.RESTARTREQUIRED: Mnyamata akuyambanso akufunika kuti asinthe kusintha kulikonse ku makonzedwe awa.

WINDOW.MINIMIZETOTRAY: Onetsetsani ku tray mmalo mwa taskbar

PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: Kusintha kulipo kwa Metrix Core. Kodi mukufuna kuikonza tsopano?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: Kusintha kulipo kwa Altitude. Kodi mungakonde kuzilandira tsopano?
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: Kugwirizana kwatayika kwa Metrix Core. Mungathe kuimitsa chikwama kapena kuyamba Metrix Core mkati.
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Zomwe mwasunga kale zomwe munapanga pa fayilo yanu ya chikwama ziyenera kusinthidwa ndi fayilo yatsopano yophimbidwa. Chifukwa cha chitetezo, mafayilo akale a fayilo yam'chikwama chosadziwika sangakhale yopanda phindu mutangoyamba kugwiritsa ntchito chikwama chatsopano, chobisika.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Panali vuto ndi Metrix Core yomwe yapangitsa kuti ithe. Ndikulimbikitsidwa kuti mupeze fayilo yanu ya debug.log pazinthu.
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGINFO: metrix.conf yanu ili ndi dongosolo losavomerezeka la masternode lomwe lingayambitse Metrix Core mwamsanga. Chonde onani fayilo iyi.
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDINFO: Panali vuto botstrapping Metrix Core. Ndikulimbikitsidwa kuti muyang'ane fayilo yanu ya Altitude kuti mupeze mavuto.
PROMPT.STARTUPFAILEDINFO: Panali vuto poyambitsa Metrix Core. Ndikofunikira kuyang'ana fayilo yanu ya Altitude log kuti mupeze zovuta.
PROMPT.CLIENTUNKNOWNERRORINFO: Panali vuto kulankhulana ndi Metrix Core. Ndikulimbikitsidwa kuti mupeze fayilo yanu ya debug.log pazinthu.
PROMPT.UNENROLLGOVERNORCONTENT: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kulembetsa Kazembe wanu? Simudzatha kuvota pazoyang'anira.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Bukhu la Maadiresi
ADDRESSBOOK.SENDINGINFO: Awa ndi adilesi yanu ya Metrix yopulumutsidwa. Nthawi zonse yesani ndalama ndi kulandira adiresi musanatumize ndalama
ADDRESSBOOK.RECEIVINGINFO: Awa ndi adilesi yanu ya Metrix yopulumutsidwa.

MAINCHAINCHECK.ALERT: Chenjezo! Simunakhala pa chimangirizo chachikulu malinga ndi zomwe wapeza mwa Metrix. Ndikulimbikitsidwa kwambiri kuti musinthanitsenso kapena kukonzanso bootstrap yanu blockchain kuti muwonongeke ndi ndalama zilizonse.

NOTIFICATIONS.CHECKINGUPDATEFAILED: Simungathe kufufuza zatsopano. Onani ma intaneti.
NOTIFICATIONS.SENDINGEXCEEDSBALANCE: Ndalama zomwe mumatumiza zimaposa kuchuluka kwanu
NOTIFICATIONS.INSUFFICIENTBALANCE: Kusakwanira kosakwanira kosankhidwa kuti mutsirizitse ntchitoyi
NOTIFICATIONS.GENERICERROR: Cholakwika chosadziwika chachitika. Mungafunike kuyambanso chikwama chanu ndikuyesanso. Ngati mavuto akupitirira chonde tumizani thandizo.
NOTIFICATIONS.MINIMUMCONFIRMATIONS: Zotsatira zonse zimafuna kutsimikizira 1 kusanayambe kugwiritsira ntchito.
NOTIFICATIONS.FAILEDTOWRITECONFIG: Panali vuto polembera fayilo yanu ya metrix.conf. Onani fayilo kuti ilipo ndipo Altitude ili ndi zilolezo zolemba.
NOTIFICATIONS.NOPUBLICUP: Palibe adilesi ya umma pagulu yomwe yapezeka. Onani kulumikizidwa kwanu kwa intaneti ndikuyambiranso Altitude.
NOTIFICATIONS.REPORTINGISSUE: Kupeza chidziwitso chazidziwitso... Izi zidzapangidwa ku clipboard yanu.

GOVERNANCE.NOTGOVERNORDETAIL: Olamulira ali ndi udindo wovota pa bajeti za pamwezi komanso kusintha kwa blockchain. Mutha kukhala Bwanamkubwa mwa kutseka zolowa mu mgwirizano wa Governance.
GOVERNANCE.CONFIRMENROLL: Mukuyamba kulembetsa monga Bwanamkubwa. Izi zitumiza kugulitsa ndi mgwirizano wofunikira ku mgwirizano wamalamulo. Mutha kuletsa nthawi iliyonse.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL1: Olamulira ali ndi udindo wovota pa bajeti za pamwezi komanso kusintha kwa blockchain.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL2: Kuti mukhalebe a Governor muyenera kutenga nawo gawo osachepera 30 masiku onse.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL3: Ngati palibe chochita kuvota ndiye kuti mutha kupitiriza kulembetsa kwanu potumiza ma ping omwe akugwira.
GOVERNANCE.NOTFULLYSYNCEDDETAIL: Kulembetsa kwanu kwa Bwanamkubwa kudzawonekera pomwe blockchain yanu ikugwirizana kwathunthu.
GOVERNANCE.DGPMIGRATIONINFO: Metrix blockchain ikupita ku DGP kusamuka. Muyenera kusiya kulembetsa ku mgwirizano wakale wa V1 ndikulembetsanso ku V2. Ngati muli ndi Bwanamkubwa wa V1 ndiye kuti mudzangowona batani losalembetsa patsamba lino.
GOVERNANCE.DGPMIGRATIONINFO2: Kulembetsa kwa DGP V2 kutheka kamodzi kuyambitsa kwa onchain kudzachitika.
GOVERNANCE.UNENROLLV1INFO1: Batani lomwe lili pansipa litulutsa Bwanamkubwa wanu wakale wa V1 ndikubwezerani chikole chanu.

BUDGET.TITLE: Zofunafuna Bajeti
BUDGET.MINIMUMGOVERNORS: Bajeti sizingadutse mpaka kuchuluka kwa Mabwanamkubwa kulipo.

CREATEPROPOSAL.TITLE: Pangani Cholinga
CREATEPROPOSAL.DESCRIPTION: Pansipa mutha kupanga lingaliro la bajeti ndikugonjera ku netiweki kuti ivotere isanakwane ndalama zotsalira.
CREATEPROPOSAL.PROPOSALADDRESS: Adilesi Yolipira (Muyenera kukhala ndi adilesi iyi)

NOTIFICATIONS.INVALIDPROPOSALDURATION: Kukonzekera kuyenera kukhala pakati pa mwezi umodzi ndi 12
NOTIFICATIONS.PINGEDGOVERNOR: Ping watumizidwa bwino. Bwanamkubwa wanu adzasinthidwa ntchitoyo ikangotsimikiziridwa
NOTIFICATIONS.UNENROLLEDGOVERNOR: Transaction yatumizidwa. Bwanamkubwa wanu adzalembetsedwa pokhapokha ntchitoyo ikatsimikiziridwa
NOTIFICATIONS.GOVERNORNOTMATURE: Bwanamkubwa wanu sanakhwime mokwanira kuti achite izi

HOME.INFOLINE1: Mukakhala ndi adiresi ya BTC, BTC iliyonse yotumizidwa ku adilesiyo imasinthidwa kukhala MRX mu adilesi yanu ya MRX.
HOME.INFOLINE2-1: Zogulitsa zimawonekera pasanathe ola kutengera nthawi za Bitcoin.
HOME.INFOLINE2-2: Pogwiritsa ntchito ntchitoyi, mukuvomereza kuti SIMUKHALA m'maiko omwe atchulidwa
HOME.INFOLINE3: Ndalama yanu ya BTC ikachotsa mudzalandira MRX yanu ku adilesi yomwe mwasankha.

HISTORY.TITLE: Mbiri Yogulitsa
HISTORY.SEARCHPLACEHOLDER: Lowetsani adilesi ya MRX kapena BTC

NOTIFICATIONS.ALREADYHAVEADDRESS: Muli kale ndi adilesi ya BTC yolumikizidwa ndi adilesi iyi ya Metrix

NOTIFICATIONS.MNSUNKNOWNERROR: Kusintha kwa dzina kwalephera, cholakwika chosadziwika chidachitika.
NOTIFICATIONS.MNSRPCUNAVAILABLE: Kusintha kwa dzina kwalephera, RPC palibe.
NOTIFICATIONS.MNSRESOLUTIONUNAVAILABLE: MNS: Simungathe kuthetsa dzina, Onetsetsani kuti dzinalo ndilolondola ndipo blockchain ikugwirizana.
